Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

If Virgo was going to leave the 
Chivtrons (might happen!) how should 
she say goodbye? 

  o Dance away saying "I'm Free!" 
  o Walk away without anyone knowing. 
  o Runs off after a tarantula and never comes back. 
  o Goes insane and tries to kill everyone. 
  o Telling everybody she's going to leave and then comes back with bombs. 
  o All of the above! 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
